author: agilliland
msg: removing the /comments/* url pattern from the RefererFilter since we no longer use the comments servlet for rendering any pages.

author: dlestrat
msg: Revisited the LDAP implementation.  Integrate Apache DS with J2.
All unit tests for LDAP are passing on Apache DS.  Leave them excluded for now.
Various quick fixes for serializable objects.  Add serialUID.
Documentation to come in the next few days.
